name: TumbleBee
description:
Entry for the Go Godot Jam 2021:

Help an oversized bumble bee to big for it's wings getting to the flowers by impulsing it in the desired direction (left click on screen, hold and drag away from the direction the bee will be launched). Every successful flower reached will bloom, help with the flowers growth in the least amount of time, 5 levels with little to no design.
